title: Newsmax CEO urges FCC to preserve national TV ownership cap
snippet: The letter was signed by Christopher Ruddy, the CEO of Newsmax, who warned that lifting the ownership caps could benefit broadcast networks like ABC, CBS, Fox and NBC, who would not be restrained from acquiring affiliated stations.

title: Newsmax CEO Blasts Efforts to End Ownership Caps | TV Tech
